types.section:
{{fr-noun|f}}

# a shared-use road for bicycles and automobiles, on which the bikes may range over the entire vehicular use surface, and where priority is given to cyclists
types.html:
vélorue f (plural vélorues)

  1. a shared-use road for bicycles and automobiles, on which the bikes may range over the entire vehicular use surface, and where priority is given to cyclists
trans: a shared-use road for bicycles and automobiles, on which the bikes may range over the entire vehicular use surface, and where priority is given to cyclists
